resources.string: Browse every available pair and pin the ones you care about.
Favorites stay synced with live prices and tidy sparklines.
Pin this pair to favorites to unlock live price updates and sparklines on the home screen.
A full-size chart view is in progress. For now, keep an eye on the mini sparklines inside your favorites list.
Kraken data is fetched directly from the official API. Times are in UTC and prices refresh as soon as the WebSocket broadcasts new ticks.
